content: **knitted jumper in 1 strand drops polaris or 2 strands drops snow piece is knitted top down with raglan size xs xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #quiethourssweater drops design pattern po-129 yarn group f or e + e ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops polaris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group f 1100-1200-1400-1500-1600-1700-2000 g colour 01 off white or use drops snow from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 800-900-1000-1100-1200-1300-1400 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 12 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 7 mm length 40 and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 12 mm drops double pointed needles size 7 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 8 stitches in width and 11 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 12 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
